verses.verse: <S%G1492>Behold,<s%> <S%G4217>what<s%> <S%G4217>manner<s%> of <S%G26>love<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G1325>bestowed<s%> on us, that we should be <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G5043>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> <S%G1223>therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1097>knows<s%> us not, <S%G3754>because<s%> it <S%G1097>knew<s%> him not.

<S%G27>Beloved,<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> are we the <S%G5043>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and it does not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G5319>appear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> we shall be: but we <S%G1492>know<s%> that, <S%G1437>when<s%> he shall <S%G5319>appear,<s%> we shall be <S%G3664>like<s%> him; for we shall <S%G3700>see<s%> him as he is.
And <S%G3956>every<s%> man that <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> in him <S%G48>purifies<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as he is <S%G53>pure.<s%>

<S%G3956>Whoever<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4160>commits<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G458>transgresses<s%> <S%G4160><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G4160>law:<s%> <S%G458><s%> for <S%G266>sin<s%> is the <S%G458>transgression<s%> of the <S%G4160>law.<s%> <S%G458><s%>
And you <S%G1492>know<s%> that he was <S%G5319>manifested<s%> to <S%G142>take<s%> away our <S%G266>sins;<s%> and in him is <S%G3956>no<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>

<S%G3956>Whoever<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3306>stays<s%> in him <S%G264>sins<s%> not: <S%G3956>whoever<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G264>sins<s%> has not <S%G3708>seen<s%> him, <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G1097>known<s%> him.

<S%G5040>Little<s%> <S%G5040>children,<s%> let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G4105>deceive<s%> you: he that <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> is <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as he is <S%G1342>righteous.<s%>

He that <S%G4160>commits<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> is of the <S%G1228>devil;<s%> for the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G264>sins<s%> from the <S%G746>beginning.<s%> For <S%G5124>this<s%> purpose the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G5319>manifested,<s%> that he might <S%G3089>destroy<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil.<s%>

<S%G3956>Whoever<s%> <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G1080>born<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> does not <S%G4160>commit<s%> <S%G266>sin;<s%> for his <S%G4690>seed<s%> <S%G3306>remains<s%> in him: and he <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G264>sin,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he is <S%G1080>born<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

In <S%G5129>this<s%> the <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> are <S%G5318>manifest,<s%> and the <S%G5043>children<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil:<s%> <S%G3956>whoever<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4160>does<s%> not <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> is not of <S%G2316>God,<s%> neither he that <S%G25>loves<s%> not his <S%G80>brother.<s%>
For <S%G846>this<s%> is the <S%G31>message<s%> that you <S%G191>heard<s%> from the <S%G746>beginning,<s%> that we should <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>

Not as <S%G2535>Cain,<s%> who was of that <S%G4190>wicked<s%> one, and <S%G4969>slew<s%> his <S%G80>brother.<s%> And <S%G5484>why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> <S%G4969>slew<s%> he him? <S%G3754>Because<s%> his own <S%G2041>works<s%> were <S%G4190>evil,<s%> and his <S%G80>brother's<s%> <S%G1342>righteous.<s%>
<S%G2296>Marvel<s%> not, my <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G3404>hate<s%> you.

We <S%G1492>know<s%> that we have <S%G3327>passed<s%> from <S%G2288>death<s%> to <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> we <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G80>brothers.<s%> He that <S%G25>loves<s%> not his <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G3306>stays<s%> in <S%G2288>death.<s%>

<S%G3956>Whoever<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3404>hates<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> is a <S%G443>murderer:<s%> and you <S%G1492>know<s%> that <S%G3956>no<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G443>murderer<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G3306>abiding<s%> in him.

<S%G1722>Hereby<s%> <S%G5129><s%> <S%G1097>perceive<s%> we the <S%G26>love<s%> of God, <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G5087>laid<s%> down his <S%G5590>life<s%> for us: and we <S%G3784>ought<s%> to <S%G5087>lay<s%> down our <S%G5590>lives<s%> for the <S%G80>brothers.<s%>

But <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G2889>world's<s%> <S%G979>good,<s%> and <S%G2334>sees<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5532>need,<s%> and <S%G2808>shuts<s%> up his <S%G4698>bowels<s%> of compassion from him, <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G3306>dwells<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in him?
My <S%G5040>little<s%> <S%G5040>children,<s%> let us not <S%G25>love<s%> in <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> in <S%G1100>tongue;<s%> but in <S%G2041>deed<s%> and in <S%G225>truth.<s%>
And <S%G1722>hereby<s%> <S%G5129><s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> that we are of the <S%G225>truth,<s%> and shall <S%G3982>assure<s%> our <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> him.
For <S%G1437>if<s%> our <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G2607>condemn<s%> us, <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3187>greater<s%> than our <S%G2588>heart,<s%> and <S%G1097>knows<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things.
<S%G27>Beloved,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> our <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G2607>condemn<s%> us not, then <S%G2192>have<s%> we <S%G3954>confidence<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> we <S%G154>ask,<s%> we <S%G2983>receive<s%> of him, <S%G3754>because<s%> we <S%G5083>keep<s%> his <S%G1785>commandments,<s%> and <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> things that are <S%G701>pleasing<s%> in his <S%G1799>sight.<s%>

And <S%G3778>this<s%> is his <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> That we should <S%G4100>believe<s%> on the <S%G3686>name<s%> of his <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> as he <S%G1325>gave<s%> us <S%G1785>commandment.<s%>

And he that <S%G5083>keeps<s%> his <S%G1785>commandments<s%> <S%G3306>dwells<s%> in him, and he in him. And <S%G1722>hereby<s%> <S%G5129><s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> that he <S%G3306>stays<s%> in us, by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he has <S%G1325>given<s%> us.
